titles.title: Securities and Exchange Commission Real Estate Leasing Authority Revocation Act
Securities and Exchange Commission Real Estate Leasing Authority Revocation Act
Securities and Exchange Commission Real Estate Leasing Authority Revocation Act
To amend title 40, United States Code, to eliminate the leasing authority of the Securities and Exchange Commission, and for other purposes.
Securities and Exchange Commission Real Estate Leasing Authority Revocation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Mr. Graves moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 189.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
